程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

类 PeProvisionerSimple

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.PeProvisioner
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.PeProvisionerSimple
public class PeProvisionerSimple
extends PeProvisioner
PeProvisionerSimple is an extension of PeProvisioner which uses a best-effort policy to allocate virtual PEs to VMs: if there is available mips on the physical PE, it allocates to a virtual PE; otherwise, it fails. Each host's PE has to have its own instance of a PeProvisioner.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0

    • PeProvisionerSimple

      public PeProvisionerSimple​(double availableMips)
      Instantiates a new pe provisioner simple.
      参数:
      availableMips - The total mips capacity of the PE that the provisioner can allocate to VMs.

  • 方法详细资料

    • allocateMipsForVm

      public boolean allocateMipsForVm​(Vm vm, double mips)
      从类复制的说明: PeProvisioner
      Allocates a new virtual PE with a specific capacity for a given VM. The virtual PE to be added will use the total or partial mips capacity of the physical PE.
      指定者:
      allocateMipsForVm 在类中 PeProvisioner
      参数:
      vm - the virtual machine for which the new virtual PE is being allocated
      mips - the mips to be allocated to the virtual PE of the given VM
      返回:
      $true if the virtual PE could be allocated; $false otherwise

    • allocateMipsForVm

      public boolean allocateMipsForVm​(java.lang.String vmUid, double mips)
      从类复制的说明: PeProvisioner
      Allocates a new virtual PE with a specific capacity for a given VM.
      指定者:
      allocateMipsForVm 在类中 PeProvisioner
      参数:
      vmUid - the virtual machine for which the new virtual PE is being allocated
      mips - the mips to be allocated to the virtual PE of the given VM
      返回:

      另请参阅:

    • allocateMipsForVm

      public boolean allocateMipsForVm​(Vm vm, java.util.List<java.lang.Double> mips)
      从类复制的说明: PeProvisioner
      Allocates a new set of virtual PEs with a specific capacity for a given VM. The virtual PE to be added will use the total or partial mips capacity of the physical PE.
      指定者:
      allocateMipsForVm 在类中 PeProvisioner
      参数:
      vm - the virtual machine for which the new virtual PE is being allocated
      mips - the list of mips capacity of each virtual PE to be allocated to the VM
      返回:
      $true if the set of virtual PEs could be allocated; $false otherwise
